column1: Others haven’t posted it yet but probably busy with the death of Kirk...also...notice...no sources so far say it is indeed a person that has corona virus....I am not saying that whatsoever...

ummm...a few things are wrong with your comment....the swine flu in 2009 killed anywhere from 100,000 to 700,000, now, if it would have had the death rate of corona virus , it would have been AT THE VERY LEAST anywhere from 14 MILLION to 30 MILLION dead

Also, some other points..

I AM NOT arguing that the flu or the swine flu isn’t/wasn’t deadly...

I AM NOT arguing that the corona virus has a high recovery ratio, it does indeed
